TopicTitle: Unsure of which visual pack to use...

Articles.Content:
Hey all,

So I've recently decided to try out some new visual packs for KSP but I'm struggling to figure out whether I can only have 1 running at a time or whether I can have the best of both... I want to use Better Atmospheres V5 and the Astronomer's Visual Pack - Interstellar V2 but they both come with roughly the same folder structure, meaning obviously one would replace components of the other. Can anyone clarify whether I can use both in some way? Or is it either one or the other? And if I can only use one, which one you prefer?

Thanks

I'm not so sure about using both at the same time, but I haven't tried it before.

Personally, I prefer Astronomer's Visual packs, but they both offer different things.

What I did is I tried out both and decided which I liked better, that is what I suggest doing.
If you have a potato of a computer, use better atmospheres, if you have a top of the line gaming PC, use astronomers.
